entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain showers beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Fog patches. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 17 March 2023
